item.title: Data science
item.description: Data Science is the art and science of transforming raw data into deliverable data products, in order to help businesses or government agencies to make more informed decisions.

item.title: Operations Research
item.description: Introduction Operations Research is the application of advanced analytical methods to enable better decision making.

item.title: Statistics
item.description: Introduction Statistics is used in many fields, including biology, sociology, psychology, medicine, economics, quality control, and sports.
